channel.description: The tools and ideas we use on our journey through business, creativity, and life.

item.title: 003 - Make Your Bed If You Want A Better Life
item.description:
We discuss how to build productive momentum in your life by simply starting your day by making your bed.
Admiral McRaven's Speech: https://youtu.be/3sK3wJAxGfs

item.title: 002 - Everyone Should Try Journaling
item.description:
We discuss how journaling has shaped our perspective, where we succeeded and failed along the way, and why we think everyone should try to journal.
Twitter: LIENpodcast Instagram: liveineverynow.podcast

item.title: 001 - Goals Are Incomplete
item.description:
We discuss goals, where they fall short, and how to use them in conjunction with visions and systems to achieve what you want.
